summary: Experienced Project Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the semiconductors industry. Strong project management professional skilled in  Photolithography, Semiconductor Industry and Metrology.

profile_positions.description:
The Process Window Control Product Group is responsible for all ASML products that provide and optimize the feed-back loops that allow for ever better on product performance of ASML's customers. 
As a product development manager, I am responsible to deliver and support all optimizer products within the Applications Business Line
profile_positions.title: Product Development Manager

profile_positions.description: The Yieldstar Program is responsible for the full YieldStar portfolio for after develop metrology, including all relevant applications. Within the YieldStart program a new series of tools have been developed to measure directly on the device patterns during chip manufacturing. As Development Product Manager I am responsible for the execution of all Developement and Engineering Teams for the In Device Metrology Program (~100 fte's)
profile_positions.title: Development Program Manager YieldStar In Device Metrology

profile_positions.description: The Yieldstar Program is responsible for the full YieldStar portfolio for after develop metrology, including all relevant applications. Within the YieldStart program a new series of tools have been developed to measure directly on the device patterns during chip manufacturing. As a product manager I am responsible to drive product direction, own product requirements and product roadmap.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager YieldStar In Device Metrology

profile_positions.description: The Yieldstar Program is responsible for the full YieldStar portfolio for after develop metrology, including all relevant applications. As Application representative, I was the mean contact for all field support organization related to these YieldStar applications.
profile_positions.title: Application Representative for YieldStar Program

profile_positions.description: The Node Transition projects from ASML help our customers enable a quicker ramp of their latest technology nodes. As a project manager for the Holistic Application Team, I managed multiple teams to deliver solutions for challenges faced in the ramp-up phase of production of both foundry and memory customers.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Holistic Applications Developement

profile_positions.description: The new node introduction programs from ASML help our customers enable a quicker ramp of their latest technology nodes. As a project manager for the Holistic Application Team, I helped a major foundry customer to implement the latest technologies to ramp their L20 and L14 nodes more quickly and with a better yield.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Korea

profile_positions.description: Project Lead position for the YieldStar CD Team, managing interactions with most of ASML's customers, to position the YieldStar CD metrology tool for better precision measurements.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead YieldStar CD

profile_positions.description:
The Product Group Applications within ASML combines computational lithography, metrology and process control in order to develop and deliver new products for ASML customers. For metrology, ASML’s products use new technologies and proprietary applications, like scatterometry, and stack reconstruction software running on powerful number crunching machines. 
As an applications engineer in this group I worked closely with ASML's customers to implement the latest ASML products timely and within specifications.
profile_positions.title: Application Engineer Eclipse

profile_positions.description:
ASML’s Customer Support Engineering sector ensures that ASML’s customers are supported efficiently by providing knowledge/technical services. Within the CSE sector, the Demolab offers our customers the possibility to get early access to the newest tools to get a head-start on their own production research. 
As an application engineer I was responsible for the preparation and execution of customer demonstrations of ASML’s latest hardware. This ranges from demonstrating the latest control mechanism (Baseliner) to specialised imaging upgrades (FlexRay and FlexWave) and demonstrations of ASML's latest tool: the EUV pre-production NXE:3100. 
To support my work in the Demolab and broaden my knowledge within the lithograpy field, I've been involved in a variety of Developement&Engineering activities.
profile_positions.title: Application Engineer Demolab
